verses.verse: Now <WG1161> concerning <WG4012> the collection <WG3048> for <WG1519> the saints <WG40>, as <WG5618> I have given order <WG1299> <WG5656> to the Congregations <WG1577> of Galatia <WG1053>, even <WG2532> so <WG3779> do <WG4160> <WG5657> ye <WG5210>.

Upon <WG2596> the first <WG3391> day of the week <WG4521> let <WG5087> every one <WG1538> of you <WG5216> lay <WG5087> <WG5720> by <WG3844> him <WG1438> in store <WG2343> <WG5723>, as <WG3748> <WG302> 'Elohim hath prospered him <WG2137> <WG5747>, that <WG3363> there be <WG1096> <WG5741> no <WG3363> gatherings <WG3048> <WG5119> when <WG3752> I come <WG2064> <WG5632>.

And <WG1161> when <WG3752> I come <WG3854> <WG5638>, whomsoever <WG3739> <WG1437> ye shall approve <WG1381> <WG5661> by <WG1223> your letters <WG1992>, them <WG5128> will I send <WG3992> <WG5692> to bring <WG667> <WG5629> your <WG5216> liberality <WG5485> unto <WG1519> Yerushalayim <WG2419>.
And <WG1161> if <WG1437> it be <WG5600> <WG5753> meet <WG514> that I go <WG4198> <WG5738> also <WG2504>, they shall go <WG4198> <WG5695> with <WG4862> me <WG1698>.

Now <WG1161> I will come <WG2064> <WG5695> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209>, when <WG3752> I shall pass through <WG1330> <WG5632> Macedonia <WG3109>: for <WG1063> I do pass through <WG1330> <WG5736> Macedonia <WG3109>.

And <WG1161> it may be <WG5177> <WG5631> that I will abide <WG3887> <WG5692>, yea <WG2228>, and <WG2532> winter <WG3914> <WG5692> with <WG4314> you <WG5209>, that <WG2443> ye <WG5210> may bring <WG4311> me <WG3165> on my journey <WG4311> <WG5661> whithersoever <WG3757> <WG1437> I go <WG4198> <WG5741>.

For <WG1063> I will <WG2309> <WG5719> not <WG3756> see <WG1492> <WG5629> you <WG5209> now <WG737> by <WG1722> the way <WG3938>; but <WG1161> I trust <WG1679> <WG5719> to tarry <WG1961> <WG5658> a while <WG5100> <WG5550> with <WG4314> you <WG5209>, if <WG1437> the YY <WG2962> permit <WG2010> <WG5725>.
But <WG1161> I will tarry <WG1961> <WG5692> at <WG1722> Ephesus <WG2181> until <WG2193> SHavu`ot <WG4005>.
For <WG1063> a great <WG3173> door <WG2374> and <WG2532> effectual <WG1756> is opened <WG455> <WG5754> unto me <WG3427>, and <WG2532> there are many <WG4183> adversaries <WG480> <WG5740>.

Now <WG1161> if <WG1437> Timotheus <WG5095> come <WG2064> <WG5632>, see <WG991> <WG5720> that <WG2443> he may be <WG1096> <WG5638> with <WG4314> you <WG5209> without fear <WG870>: for <WG1063> he worketh <WG2038> <WG5736> the work <WG2041> of the YY <WG2962>, as <WG5613> I <WG1473> also <WG2532> do.

Let <WG1848> no <WG3361> man <WG5100> therefore <WG3767> despise <WG1848> <WG5661> him <WG846>: but <WG1161> conduct <WG4311> him <WG846> forth <WG4311> <WG5657> in <WG1722> peace <WG1515>, that <WG2443> he may come <WG2064> <WG5632> unto <WG4314> me <WG3165>: for <WG1063> I look for <WG1551> <WG5736> him <WG846> with <WG3326> the brethren <WG80>.

As <WG1161> touching <WG4012> our brother <WG80> Apollos <WG625>, I <WG3870> greatly <WG4183> desired <WG3870> <WG5656> him <WG846> to <WG2443> come <WG2064> <WG5632> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209> with <WG3326> the brethren <WG80>: but <WG2532> his will <WG2307> was <WG2258> <WG5713> not <WG3756> at all <WG3843> to <WG2443> come <WG2064> <WG5632> at this <WG3568> time; but <WG1161> he will come <WG2064> <WG5695> when <WG3752> he shall have convenient time <WG2119> <WG5661>.
Watch ye <WG1127> <WG5720>, stand fast <WG4739> <WG5720> in <WG1722> the faith <WG4102>, quit you like men <WG407> <WG5737>, be strong <WG2901> <WG5744>.
Let <WG1096> all <WG3956> your <WG5216> things <WG3956> be done <WG1096> <WG5737> with <WG1722> charity <WG26>.

<WG1161> I beseech <WG3870> <WG5719> you <WG5209>, brethren <WG80>, (ye know <WG1492> <WG5758> the house <WG3614> of Stephanas <WG4734>, that <WG3754> it is <WG2076> <WG5748> the firstfruits <WG536> of Achaia <WG882>, and <WG2532> that they have addicted <WG5021> <WG5656> themselves <WG1438> to <WG1519> the ministry <WG1248> of the saints <WG40>,)

<WG2532> That <WG2443> ye <WG5210> submit yourselves <WG5293> <WG5747> unto such <WG5108>, and <WG2532> to every one <WG3956> that helpeth <WG4903> <WG5723> with us, and <WG2532> laboureth <WG2872> <WG5723>.

<WG1161> I am glad <WG5463> <WG5719> of <WG1909> the coming <WG3952> of Stephanas <WG4734> and <WG2532> Fortunatus <WG5415> and <WG2532> Achaicus <WG883>: for that <WG3754> which was lacking <WG5303> on your part <WG5216> they <WG3778> have supplied <WG378> <WG5656>.
For <WG1063> they have refreshed <WG373> <WG5656> my <WG1699> spirit <WG4151> and <WG2532> yours <WG5216>: therefore <WG3767> acknowledge ye <WG1921> <WG5720> them that are such <WG5108>.

The Congregations <WG1577> of Asia <WG773> salute <WG782> <WG5736> you <WG5209>. Aquila <WG207> and <WG2532> Priscilla <WG4252> salute <WG782> <WG5736> you <WG5209> much <WG4183> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>, with <WG4862> the Congregation <WG1577> that is in <WG2596> their <WG846> house <WG3624>.
All <WG3956> the brethren <WG80> greet <WG782> <WG5736> you <WG5209>. Greet ye <WG782> <WG5663> one another <WG240> with <WG1722> an holy <WG40> kiss <WG5370>.
The salutation <WG783> of me SHa'ul <WG3972> with mine own <WG1699> hand <WG5495>.
If any man <WG1536> love <WG5368> <WG5719> not <WG3756> the YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, let him be <WG2277> <WG5749> Anathema <WG331> Maranatha <WG3134>.
The grace <WG5485> of our YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216>.

My <WG3450> love <WG26> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216> all <WG3956> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>. Amen <WG281>. The first <WG4413> epistle to <WG4314> the Corinthians <WG2881> was written <WG1125> <WG5648> from <WG575> Philippi <WG5375> by <WG1223> Stephanas <WG4734> and <WG2532> Fortunatus <WG5415> and <WG2532> Achaicus <WG883> and <WG2532> Timotheus <WG5095>.
